content.question: The instantaneous rate of change of the vector-valued function <math alttext="f of t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> is given by <math alttext="r of t, equals, open angled bracket, 3 plus 30 t, minus 8 times t cubed, comma 9 times t squared, plus 4, t, close angled bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>r</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>⟨</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>30</mn><mi>t</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>,</mo><mn>9</mn><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow><mo>⟩</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>. If <math alttext="f of 1, equals, open angled bracket, 4 comma negative 3, close angled bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>⟨</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>,</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mrow><mo>⟩</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, what is <math alttext="f of negative 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="open angled bracket, negative 19, comma 5, close angled bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>⟨</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>19</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>⟩</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="open angled bracket, negative 2, comma negative 9, close angled bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>⟨</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></mrow><mo>⟩</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="open angled bracket, 6 comma negative 14, close angled bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>⟨</mo><mrow><mn>6</mn><mo>,</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>14</mn></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo>⟩</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="open angled bracket, 10 comma negative 1, close angled bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>⟨</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>,</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>⟩</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open angled bracket, negative 2, comma negative 9, close angled bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>⟨</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></mrow><mo>⟩</mo></mrow></math>

unit.text: 9: Parametric Equations, Polar Coordinates, and Vector-Valued Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
